1.title: New Faces & Old Wounds

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

1.plot: In the season premiere, the newest wives are introduced. Ronnie hosts a barbecue to celebrate the start of summer and drama ensues between the ladies.

2.title: Drag Queens and Drama Queens

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

2.plot: Drag Queens and Drama Queens: Jody throws a drag queen party to celebrate gay pride.

3.title: Catwalks & Catfights

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

3.plot: Amanda and Ioulia's friendship starts out rocky while the two star in a bikini fashion show that creates drama for all the housewives.

4.title: Second Chances & Second Thoughts

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

4.plot: Amanda gets face lift for her birthday. Robin receives news about her singing audition.

5.title: High Notes & Low Blows

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

5.plot: Ioulia invites the housewives over for a drawing party, which includes a male model. Robin achieves a live singing gig at an event.

6.title: Cold Shoulders & Hot Butts

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

6.plot: Amanda, Ronnie and Jody take a trip to Toronto for Jody's appearance on Top Chef Canada.

7.title: Sweet & Soured

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

7.plot: While in Toronto, Jody's appearance on Top Chef Canada ends with a garden party. Drama ensues after the ladies have had enough of Mary and Ronnie's rocky friendship.

8.title: Quiet Retreats & Loud Attacks

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

8.plot: It's Ronnie's birthday and the wives head out for a weekend of pamper. The group realizes that just because Mary is absent from the festivities is no guarantee that there won't be any drama.

9.title: War & Piece of Cake

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

9.plot: Ronnie hosts a glamorous party for Ioulia's birthday but not all of the ladies are invited. Jody plans to invite the ladies elsewhere to threaten Mary's birthday party.

10.title: In Costume & Out of Control

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

10.plot: In the Season 2 finale, Ioulia hosts her art gallery show, Mary announces her new relationship with a billionaire and Amanda hosts an event to introduce her Kombucha tea but like at any event with the fellow housewives, drama seems to find its way.

1.title: Let the Games Begin

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

1.plot: The wives travel to the luxurious resort of Whistler, B.C. for a decadent weekend of wining and dining, but a certain sharp tongue leaves many of them with a bad taste in their mouths.

2.title: Oh, Bully!

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

2.plot: Christina's anxiety over turning 30 is heightened by the threat of Jody attending her birthday party and Mary questions whether her BFF Ronnie will truly have her back if she too is targeted by Jody - again.

3.title: She Should've Kept Her Clothes On

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

3.plot: Jody confronts Christina regarding her racy behaviour at her birthday party, while Reiko's martial arts threaten to impact her looks. Mary and Ronnie's friendship of 18 years begins to unravel.

4.title: Pass the Peace Pipe

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

4.plot: Reiko tries to get the wives to make peace as Mary and Ronnie compete for Jody's allegiance during their text war. Meanwhile Christina prepares herself for her next encounter with Jody.

5.title: Mending Fences & Burning Bridges

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

5.plot: Mary and Ronnie finally attempt to mend fences while Christina burns a potential bridge with Ronnie. Reiko hopes to participate in the Luxury Supercar Show, and Christina falls for a new suitor.

6.title: Hot Cars and Cold Shoulders

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

6.plot: In the aftermath of the Keefer hotel conflict, Mary questions who's left on her side. Ronnie starts a new business venture, while Reiko nervously prepares to model at the Supercars fashion show.

7.title: Back in the Saddle

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

7.plot: The Wives take their kids back to school, and Ronnie debates reuniting with Mary by inviting her to her cowboy-themed birthday party. Meanwhile, her plans for launching a wine label encounter a major hiccup.

8.title: Ay, Caramba!

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

8.plot: After being attacked by Jody and Mia at Ronnie's birthday, Mary leaves the drama behind and heads to Mexico, but leaves somebody important behind. Meanwhile, Jody turns her critical eye towards her own bff Reiko.

9.title: Mexican Standoff

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

9.plot: Mary models for a Blue Tulum photoshoot in Mexico, and returns home to face extra heat from Ronnie. Christina tries to recruit Mia to Team Mary even as Jody confronts Mary about spreading rumours about her store.

10.title: Sour Grapes

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

10.plot: In the wake of Jody serving Mary with legal papers, Ronnie whisks the Wives off to wine country where Christina risks getting back into Jody's bad books, and Reiko's own bottled-up issues with Jody begin to leak out.

11.title: You Scratch My Back and I'll Stab Yours

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

11.plot: It's an event-full week for the Wives as Reiko throws a lavish Bollywood party, and the ladies attend a glitzy high-society party where Mary and Jody compete for Ronnie's loyalty.

12.title: The Fur Flies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

12.plot: Jody throws a glitzy party to launch her new fashion label, and Mary's signing comeback is complete when she at her fundraiser, but the event is disrupted when one of the Wives is ejected from the venue.

13.title: Karma Is a Bitch

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

13.plot: Ronnie hosts a launch for her wine but drama with one of the wives leaves a bad taste in her mouth, prompting her to invite the ladies to finally air out their differences.

14.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

14.plot: Jody and Mary's hostilities are escalated and Ronnie and Mary's friendship is called into question like never before.

15.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver (TV Series 2012–2013)

imdb.title: The Real Housewives of Vancouver
plot: The series originally focused on Jody Claman, Christina Kiesel, Reiko MacKenzie, Ronnie Negus, and Mary Zilba; the second season lineup consisted of Claman, Negus, Zilba, Amanda Hansen, Robin Reichman and Ioulia Reynolds.::wikipedia
